welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nanjing, a city steeped in history and known for its beautiful landscapes and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Les Cinq Sens 法国乐尚餐厅
restaurants.description: Les Cinq Sens 法国乐尚餐厅 is a french restaurant located in 南京市.
restaurants.address: 52-1 Hankou Rd., 南京市, 江苏

restaurants.address: 100 Zhongshan Rd | 中山路100号 (1/F IST Mall | 艾尚天地1楼), 南京市, 江苏

restaurants.name: 丸亀製麺 Marugame Seimen
restaurants.description: 丸亀製麺 Marugame Seimen is a udon restaurant located in 南京市.

restaurants.name: MA-Xiangxing Muslim Restaurant (马祥兴清真菜馆)
restaurants.description: MA-Xiangxing Muslim Restaurant (马祥兴清真菜馆) is a xinjiang restaurant located in 南京市.
